title: Performing Under Pressure: The Science of Doing Your Best
description:
Performing Under Pressure: The Science of Doing Your Best When It Matters Most by Hendrie Weisinger, J. P. Pawliw-Fry

Requirements: ePUB reader, 2.3 MB

Overview: Nobody performs better under pressure. Regardless of the task, pressure ruthlessly diminishes our judgment, decision-making, attention, dexterity, and performance in every professional and personal arena. In Performing Under Pressure, Drs. Hendrie Weisinger and J.P. Pawliw-Fry introduce us to the concept of pressure management, offering empirically tested short term and long term solutions to help us overcome the debilitating effects of pressure
